caption:
Table 1: R1M cross-modal retrieval performance comparison of our proposed methods and other reported frameworks. Meth-
ods that not require any additional mono-modal data marked with  ?.

Table 2: Ablation and comparison of textual recipe compo-
nents. Performance metrics reported for 10k search space 
to allow comparison to H-T[29]. "Tr" indicates whether the 
model was trained using only partial inputs. Note that H-
T[29] uses additional unpaired recipe data during training.
Table 3: Multi-lingual performance of translated R1M.

Table 4: Recipe-to-image synthesis performance. We evaluate the quality of images generated from recipe embeddings by two 
metrics: FID of synthetic images, and retrieval scores averaged over 10 random 1K subsets. Food images generated from CHEF

Table 5: Image embedding-to-image synthesis performance. Results are calculated similarly to those in Tab. 4, however, images 
are generated from visual embeddings instead of recipe embeddings.  ? indicates values taken directly from [45].
